note.p: Welsh artist. Studied at the Royal Academy Schools in London, and in Italy. Worked as an artist in London, including for the Graphic; later settled in Cardiff. Member of the Cardiff Naturalists’ Society from 1879; president, 1888. Discovered fossil footprints in the Triassic rocks of Glamorgan, Wales, in 1878.
Transactions of the Cardiff Naturalists’ Society 48 (1915): 5–16
